item.title: [PI] xteletome command
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

[quote=“getstabbed, post:4, topic:367327”]14 errors, Dastan. Thanks anyway.
Canio, not sure what base it came from, but the source I used was Exion.[/quote]
exeion my friend
that is PI base
project-instanty hold on lemme get my command

and by the way
its not
xteltome
its just teletome

edit
if you search teletome youll find it works …
but just incase

if (playerCommand.startsWith("teletome")) { try { if(c.playerRights == 0 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1){ return; } String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(9); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = c.absX; c2.teleportToY = c.absY; c2.heightLevel = c.heightLevel; c.sendMessage("You have teleported " + c2.playerName + " to you."); c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName + "."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

item.title: [PI] xteletome command
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Here you go

[code=cmf]}

        if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(10);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported to " + playerName);
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.title: [PI] xteletome command
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

I tried to code in a command which teleports players to me. It didn’t work so I’m wondering if someone else could give me one. The source is quite different to most which is probably why my coding failed with it. I’ll give the code of the xteleto command so you can adapt it or see what coding it uses.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto") && c.playerRights >= 1) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); } } } }
Thanks.

Read full topic
